rescuecore2.messages

Interface Command

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Message
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommand, AKClear, AKExtinguish, AKLoad, AKMove, AKRescue, AKRest, AKSay, AKSpeak, AKSubscribe, AKTell, AKUnload

    public interface Command
extends Message
    A sub-interface of Message that tags messages that are interpreted as agent commands.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityID getAgentID()
      Get the id of the agent-controlled entity that has issued this command.
      int getTime()
      Get the timestep this command is intended for.

      • Methods inherited from interface rescuecore2.messages.Message

        getURN, read, write

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentID

        EntityID getAgentID()
        Get the id of the agent-controlled entity that has issued this command.
        Returns:
        The id of the agent.

      • getTime

        int getTime()
        Get the timestep this command is intended for.
        Returns:
        The timestep.
